about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn more about who I am, what I do, and what drives me.
paragraphs: My name is Jakub Kret, and I am a junior full-stack web developer passionate about creating modern web applications.
I work with technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.
I build responsive, fast, and secure websites and web apps with a focus on performance, security, and clean architecture.
I develop Single Page Applications, integrate REST APIs, and work with NoSQL databases.
My goal is to grow as a full-stack developer — both as a freelancer and as part of a team creating digital products that solve real-world problems.
I constantly learn new tools, frameworks, and best practices to deliver professional and scalable solutions.
If you’re looking for an ambitious JavaScript and TypeScript developer to collaborate with — feel free to get in touch!
